word:
Saul knew that in this last act, of consulting the witch of Endor, he cut the last shred 
                                                                           377
which held him to God. He knew that if he had not before willfully separated himself from God, this act sealed that separation, and made it final. He had made an agreement with death, and a covenant with hell. The cup of his iniquity was full. 

                                               -
